lines: 1. Borabu ndae as' omoichano,Ndae rioka,Obotuko, ng'arende korwa nka,Ndae rioka,Ndend' amagoro;Timboreti korora egeka,Kogoro okomo kong'isane.
2. Tinanarete iga, gosaba ng'a,Ay'ondaeNigo nanchete gochor' ayane,Bono ndae.Ngancha omogoko ko inde omwoba,Nkaenena,Toinyor' ayaetire.
3. Chinguru chiao chiansesenirie,Nchindae riokaAs'amanani nas' emerindo,Goika bokieKobwakire 'Malaika bagoka,'Banyanchete ko bansireirie ake.
